transcript:
Customer: Nahi garmiyo ko short pehenta hai.

Fir bhi isse koi dikkat nahi hai, itna loose hota hai.

Koi dikkat nahi hai, jyada us par dhyan mat do, padhai par dhyan do, apne aap wo samne nazar aayega.

Short hi thik hai.
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan, good afternoon sir, Vasundhara bol rahi hu IndiaMART se, Pramod sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Accha sir, wo aap se discussion hua hoga aapki jo catalog service chal rahi hai IndiaMART pe Sunrise Electrical.
Hain na? Vishal ka, I think Aasim sir ka bhi discussion hua hoga. Sir aapke ticket closer ke liye maine call kiya tha sir, aapko already inform kiya tha ki jaise apne refund ke liye aap bol rahe the ki service nahi mil rahi hai, relevant leads aa rahi hai. To isko refund karane ke liye sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Hain na? Sir bas dekho main aapko yehi inform karna chahti hu already matlab aapko unhone bataya hoga Aasim sir ne bhi ki hamare paas aisi koi bhi refund policy nahi hai.
To services mein baki ka Vishal jo aapki services dekh raha hai already, jo bhi issue aata hai wo aapko help out karega sir, resolve karega usko.
Customer: Char mahine se to ye koi bhi aapka aadmi jo hai sirf bewakoof banane ke alawa koi kaam nahi kar rahe ye itne chatur chalak log hai ek se ek vishesh aadmi aata hai aur ulti seedhi kahani padh jata hai wo.
Hmm?
Customer: Kya?
Customer: Kisne diya hai samasya ka solution? Kisne diya hai samasya ka solution kisne diya hai?
Executive: Sir, aapki baat main samajh rahi hu. Par ek baat bataiye, jab refund policy hamare paas hogi hi nahi to hum aapko refund wo kaha se kara ke aayenge?
Customer: To aisi policy bhi to hogi aapke paas ke paise le lo aur wo policy.
Executive: Hum aap jo deal karte ho wo transformer mein deal karte ho, thik hai.
Customer: Suno. Haan, aapne paise le liya, samaan nahi de rahe ho. Ye yehi policy policy hai. Company ki policy company hoti hai, aapki company dharti pe aati hai ki kahi aasmaan se utari hai?
Executive: Sir, baat wali baat nahi hai but jab hai hi nahi to hum kaise band karae service, kaise refund karae?
Customer: Policy nahi company ki policy company ne apne liye policy banayi hai ki hamare liye banayi hai? Unki policy unke liye hai, hamari policy. Bhai humne tumhe paisa diya hai, hame kaam do. Jiske jis jis paisa diya uska maksad pura karo. Company ke policy ka bhad mein aur ye ye jo bewakoof banane wale wale jo hai ye bhad mein jaa utare jo hai. Kya karna hai batao? Nalayak log hai sab.
Customer: Mere char mahine se mera time waste kar rahe hai wo mujhe pagal bana rahe hai aur maine kaha ise band kar do, band kar do, band hi nahi kar rahe ho aur court mein case aur karunga main.
Executive: Sir, agar hota to hum aapko mana hi kyu karte? Already pata hai mujhe ek do mahine se baat kar rahe hain.
Customer: To fir aapne mujhe phone kis liye karaya? Ye ye main us din phone kar kar ke haar gaya. Phone hi nahi kisi ne uthaya, na kisi ne baat karai, na kuch kara, na kuch kara bakwas bazi jo hai faltu ki bakwas bazi karte rehte hain. Ab batao aap aap hamari beti ya behen jaisi ho sakti hai ladkiyo ko ladko ko baat kara karo na ye ladkiyo ko phone de dete hain unse kuch keh bhi kehne ka nahi hai sunne ka nahi aadmi jo hai.
Executive: Sir, dekhiye ab Sir hamari jo mata behene hai na koi tum koi aisa nahi meri aap se particular koi aisi ladai hai meri behen bhi ho sakti hai beti bhi ho sakti hai. Nahi definitely.
Hmm? Accha dekhiye, accha bataiye hum deal karte hain. IndiaMART jo hai IndiaMART itna badmash hai. IndiaMART ye maine aisa hai na main isko karana hi nahi chahta tha. Mere ko ye in jalim jo aapke jo jaal saaz log hai unhone mil mil ke phone kar kar ke phone kar kar ke mujhe pareshan kar ke aakhir kar mujhe ye wo dilwa diya mujhe jo hai. Ab ek bhi nalayak jo hai ek bhi nazar nahi aa raha hai. Ab mujhe unka malik ka number de do milega?
Executive: Nahi sir, wo to kya hai hamare paas nahi hota authorized bhi nahi hai aise share karna. Tabhi jo hamare dekhiye main Vishal ki manager hu meri manager Aasim sir.
Customer: Malik ka number kisi ko dikkat ho rahi ho, Pradhan Mantri se aadmi baat kar leta hai malik Pradhan Mantri se bada hai ke malik nahi karega?
Executive: Sir to hai koi dikkat hoti hai ek normal Pradhan Mantri ko na call karta hai. Ek aad lakh crore ka business hoga koi dikkat thodi hai baat karne mein dikkat aa rahi hai ek aam aadmi se.
Executive: Sir samjhe aap bataiye aap 100 TV mein deal.
Executive: Sir aap bataiye aap 100 TV mein aap le aate hain. Upar daal ke na office kahan hai unka malik ka?
Executive: Sir aise hamare paas number nahi hota hai. To sir aapko kya kya hai number de do. Jaise jo aapko yahi jankari nahi hai to fir malik ke kahan rehte hain unki bhi jankari nahi hai to aapko jo fir kya jankari hai? Unko office mein mil lunga jo hai. To aap sir office aa jaiye koi dikkat nahi hai IndiaMART head office Noida mein aa jaiye sector 135. Aapke office kahan hai? Malik kahan baithe hain sahab kahan baithe hain?
Executive: Sir, saara naukri.com ke head office Noida mein hi hai. Saare log yahi pe hi baithe hain.
Customer: Saare baithe hain na yahi?
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Haan to kya hai address aapke office ka?
Executive: Sector 135 Noida.
Executive: IndiaMART Intermesh Limited ke naam se hai, haan 135.
Customer: 135 mein 135 mein?
Executive: Haan. Haan ji.
Customer: To mujhe appointment de do unke sahab se bhi main baat ho jayegi meri jo.
Executive: Sir wo to aap kabhi bhi anytime aa sakte hain 10 to 6 ke beech mein. Par ye hai ki jo bhi aapko milega hamare jo baithe baithe hain wo jo hai. Sir owner ka aisa kuch nahi hai ki wo 100% sure yahi baithe hain hamesha.
Customer: Are main wo tumse yehi hai na mujhe ab aap logo se baatein nahi karni hai.
Executive: To owner thodi na yaha baithe hain sir wo to fir ye hai ki jo hamare VP baithe hain. Are kya main kahi to baithe ho. Sir travelling to unka all over har jagah rehta hai na wo baithe thodi na hai kabhi kisi location pe kabhi kisi city wagera mein unka to jitne ka branch hai har jagah wo unka location movement hi hota rehta hai. Har jagah visit pe rehte hain wo to. Par aapke yaha jo AVP VP wagera hai wo sab to aap se milenge hi milenge agar. Nahi nahi ye main aisa hai ye aap mere se utpatang vyavhar karte rehte hain unka bata to du main kam se kam jo hai unki mail ID bhej do mail kar dunga unke liye.
Executive: Sir aapka saara concern hame har cheez pata hua hai. Thik hai Aasim sir ne. Ye sab na ye aapke jo VP hue hai. Sir aapka feedback dekho kafi baar open tha, kafi baar aapne call kiya hai. Aapko same hi information provide ki hai refund policy nahi hai sir hamare paas koi bhi aisi par aapka ye feedback hai.
Customer: Main kya karu main kya karu matlab mere paise ka fir kya hoga uska jo main paisa diya aapko?
Executive: Sir hum jo deal karte hain wo apni UP same isi location mein deal karte ho na? Yehi se hi aapko chahiye na? Wo aap rehne do un gaon ke bare mein baat. Par accha ek baat batao mujhe batao agar waha se buyer ki lead generate nahi ho rahi hogi to hum aapko kaise provide karenge? Main malik ke paas pahunch ke baat kar lunga tum aap mujhe itna samjho main leke ye ye matlab koi is tarike se main baatein kar raha hu to aap aapko kahi aisa lag raha ho ke koi matlab koi aise hi jo hai main time waste kar raha hu aapke sath.
Executive: Nahi sir, baat wo nahi hai baat ye hai ki main bhi aapko samjhana hi chahti hu. Itne aapko kya itne halki mein ye itne log jo hai aapke mujhe ek bewakoof bana rahe hain aur itna halke mein le rahe hain. To main jo hai na mujhe kitni badi baat nahi hai mere liye inse baat karne ke liye.
Executive: Sir agar hota to main definitely aapke liye. All in all kaun hai yaha kaun baitha hai baithe sahab baithe hain. Aasim sir Aasim Aasim sir bekar ka aadmi hai ye to bekar wo ghumane firane wala aadmi hai. To unke upar VP mam hai VP mam hai. Bewakoof banata hai. Hain? VP mam hai hamari vice president mam hai. Haan to unse baat karao unse baat kara baat kara sakti hu aapki. Unse karao jo hai unse puchunga main owner se kaise baat hongi jo. But sir abhi jo aapka ticket hai wo hum close kar de? Hain? Aapka ticket open tha aapne call kiya tha. Maine kiya tha? Aapka ek call aaya tha to hum pick nahi kar pae the isliye aapka concern list ho jata hai. Wo to wo to wo to badmashi main unko bataunga na madam ko batao abhi meri baat karao unse ek baar. Sir main ek baar call back arrange karne ke liye bol deti hu Aasim aapko ek baar message kar denge. Itni himmat DM ki bhi nahi hai jo main call karu call aam aadmi ka call DM bhi uthata hai to aap jo hai na itna pagal banate ho logo ko. Abhi milao aap hi mila lo aap hi DM sahab ko phone milao foran utha ke aapki samasya sunenge wo kitne busy aadmi hai DM se jyada busy to ho nahi tum. Baat karao mera kaun hai vice president kaun hai sir kaun hai kya hai? Main ek baar bolti hu mam se call back arrange karane ke liye thik hai 10 minute mein. Bolo bolo baat karenge unse. Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to irrelevant buyleads.

- Alleges executives are wasting his time.

- Wants to speak with the owner.



Resolution:

- Executive stated no refund policy.

- Offered assistance from Vishal to resolve issues.

- Offered to arrange a call with VP.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will arrange a call back with VP.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, policy, owner, vp
